snippet: Mr. Christie said New Jersey should dip into its own general fund to pay for projects because its Transportation Trust Fund was about to run out of money....
abstract: New Jersey Gov Chris Christie orders officials to pay for 'essential' transportation projects  using money from state's general fund until impasse over Transportation Trust Fund is resolved.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Christie said New Jersey should dip into its own general fund to pay for projects because its Transportation Trust Fund was about to run out of money.

headline.main: Christie Orders Use of General Fund for ‘Essential’ Transportation Work
headline.print_headline: New Jersey to Use General Fund for Road Repairs
